          <title>
            <string language="ca">L'arc de Sant Martí. El color</string>
            <string language="en">The rainbow. Colour</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Regenbogen. Farbe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'arc-en-ciel. Couleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O arco-íris. Cor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Rainbow. Colore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ουράνιο τόξο. Χρώμα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Unitat de programació que recull diversos materials curriculars (tant de tipus convencional com de suport amb les TIC) al voltant del color.</string>
            <string language="en">A programme unit that brings together different curricular material (both conventional and ICT) dealing with colour.</string>
          </description>

unterschiedliche Lehrplanmaterial (herkömmlich und ICT) 
beschäftigend Farbe zusammenbringt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité de programme qui rassemble le 
matériel curriculaire différent (conventionnel et ICT) traitant la 
couleur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade do programa que traga junto o 
material curricular diferente ( convencional e ICT) que trata da cor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità di programma che riunisce il materiale 
d'insegnamento differente (sia convenzionale che ICT) che si occupa 
del colore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια μονάδα προγράμματος που συγκεντρώνει το 
διαφορετικό διδακτικό υλικό (και συμβατικός και ICT) 
εξετάζοντας το χρώμα.</string>
          </description>
